locations: Yuba City, California, USA::(699 Joann Way)
imdb.plot outline: Julia Miles was your average "Youtuber" who fell victim to the twisted game, known as Project Piecemeal. On the exterior Project Piecemeal appeared to be to way for the troubled youth to engage in their dark desires, but no one knew this game was controlled by a malicious group called The Brotherhood. When Julia is found dead, her uncle, Edgar Miles, decides he will not rest until he uncovers the truth of the Brotherhood and Julia's death. Edgar begins hunting down the Brotherhood, one-by-one, with the help from his tech-savvy friend Carlos. As he inches closer to the secrets of the Brotherhood, his life and those around him becomes in danger.
imdb.title: Project Piecemeal
plot: Edgar Miles is out to avenge the mysterious murder of his niece, Julia. Along the way, Edgar uncovers a deadly viral game called _Project Piecemeal_ (qv) that leads to a malicious group of individuals, known as The Brotherhood.::Corlie Presswood
